Module opentdk.gui
Package org.opentdk.gui.application

Class BaseController

java.lang.Object
org.opentdk.gui.application.BaseController
public class BaseController extends Object
BaseControlle is the framework template that is used as extend for any new JavaFX controller class, implemented in a JavaFX application.

Sample usage:

 import com.lk.javafx.application.BaseController;
 public class myController extends BaseController{
 ...
 }
Author:
HWA (LK Test Solutions)

  • Method Details

    • getParent

      public javafx.scene.Parent getParent()
      Returns an object of type Parent, which represents the root element of a FXML description.
      Returns:
      Object of type Parent with the root element of a FXML description.
      See Also:
      • Parent

    • setParent

      public void setParent(javafx.scene.Parent p)
      Assigns an instance of type Parent to the Parent property of this class. The Parent parameter should include an instance of the root element of a FXML description e.g. AnchorPane, BorderPane etc.
      Parameters:
      p - an object of type Parent with the root element of a FXML
      See Also:
      • Parent

    • getStage

      public javafx.stage.Stage getStage()
      Returns the JavaFX stage, which is the container for all GUI elements, defined in the controller. A stage represents a window of the JavaFX application. The getStage method gives the controller access to the stage, so that every method of the stage can be called from the returned object.

      e.g.
      getStage().getWidth();
      This will return the current width of the window or area, shown by the stage.

      Returns:
      the JavaFX stage that was created by the instance of the controller
      See Also:
      • Stage

    • setStage

      public void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage st)
      Sets the value of the stage property of this controller with the associated stage, that will be created when instantiating a controller which is representing a window. The setStage method should only be called by the showStage method of the class BaseApplication.
      Parameters:
      st - the JavaFX stage that was created by the instance of the controller
      See Also:
      • BaseApplication
      • Stage

    • getRootLayout

      public javafx.scene.Parent getRootLayout()
      Return the root layout, which is the top level JavaFX element, defined in the FXML element of this controller.
      Returns:
      Top level JavaFX element, defined in the associated FXML element of this controller class.
